attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: members of the public or shop keepers should be allowed to apply to their local council to enforce a youth curfew ,if a resident of an area desides there are too many youths hanging around near their home or local shops then enforcing a curfew of 7pm winter hrs & 9pm summer hrs is not unreasonable this should apply to any person under 18
